26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_subdev_fb_ramnv04.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:33 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include "ram.h"
30#include "regsnv04.h"
31
32const struct nvkm_ram_func
33nv04_ram_func = {
34};
35
36int
37nv04_ram_new(struct nvkm_fb *fb, struct nvkm_ram **pram)
38{
39 struct nvkm_device *device = fb->subdev.device;
40 u32 boot0 = nvkm_rd32(device, NV04_PFB_BOOT_0);
41 u64 size;
42 enum nvkm_ram_type type;
43
44 if (boot0 & 0x00000100) {
45 size = ((boot0 >> 12) & 0xf) * 2 + 2;
46 size *= 1024 * 1024;
47 } else {
48 switch (boot0 & NV04_PFB_BOOT_0_RAM_AMOUNT) {
49 case NV04_PFB_BOOT_0_RAM_AMOUNT_32MB:
50 size = 32 * 1024 * 1024;
51 break;
52 case NV04_PFB_BOOT_0_RAM_AMOUNT_16MB:
53 size = 16 * 1024 * 1024;
54 break;
55 case NV04_PFB_BOOT_0_RAM_AMOUNT_8MB:
56 size = 8 * 1024 * 1024;
57 break;
58 case NV04_PFB_BOOT_0_RAM_AMOUNT_4MB:
59 size = 4 * 1024 * 1024;
60 break;
61 }
62 }
63
64 if ((boot0 & 0x00000038) <= 0x10)
65 type = NVKM_RAM_TYPE_SGRAM;
66 else
67 type = NVKM_RAM_TYPE_SDRAM;
68
69 return nvkm_ram_new_(&nv04_ram_func, fb, type, size, 0, pram);
70}
71
